WarDrum.speaker: Narrator
WarDrum.text: *This mighty drum is powerful enough to be heard for miles. You need only strike it.*

WarDrum.speaker: Narrator
WarDrum.text: *Chaos ignites in the ruins around you. Goblins howl and spit, clawing for their weapons.*
WarDrum.context: InternalNodeContext: The player might play the drum again when the Backup and Checkpoint goblins are talking or dancing

Torture.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin raises a club, ready to hit the adventurer, but then notices the player and stops.NodeContext: He's torturing an adventurer and getting sadistic pleasure from this.

Torture.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture.text: You again? Wanna join 'im this time?

Torture.speaker: Player
Torture.text: Why are you still torturing him?

Torture.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture.text: Some other git found the grove before we did. Made us look real stupid, 'e did.
Torture.context: NodeContext: a little sour at the memory

Torture.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torture.text: So now we're makin' sure this lad regrets not tellin' us.
Torture.context: NodeContext: deriving sadistic pleasure from this.

Rat_001.speaker: Rat
Rat_001.text: Let this one be! My prisoner, drow, not yours. Not this one. I am hungry... starving...

Goblet.speaker: Lookout Grush
Goblet.text: I'm watchin' ya. Spike promised that any meat that falls off is mine.
Goblet.context: CinematicNodeContext: He's standing a few paces away from the prisoner.NodeContext: Mean.

PoisoningInterrogation.context: NodeContext: Spotting the player and accusing them of being the one who poisoned their beer (and comrades)

PoisoningInterrogation.speaker: Narrator
PoisoningInterrogation.text: *A strange symbol glows, marked on their flesh, and something within you stirs in response.*

PoisoningInterrogation.speaker: Player
PoisoningInterrogation.text: If I'd poisoned you, do you really think I'd still be here?
Or you just thought we'd be stupid enough to believe ya!
PoisoningInterrogation.context: NodeContext: We gave a lousy excuse and they're seeing right through it. They're going to attack us now.

Caster_01.speaker: Erna
Caster_01.text: You don't want to go in there. Really.
Caster_01.context: NodeContext: Flat, more serious. The previous warning was an attempt to be friendly, but we're pushing our luck now and the humour's gone.

Volo_Massacre.speaker: Volo
Volo_Massacre.text: There! That's the last frothing innard catalogued.
Volo_Massacre.context: NodeContext: investigating dead goblins - pleased to meet the perpetraror of the masscare

Volo_Massacre.speaker: Volo
Volo_Massacre.text: Best not to hang around. Whoever is responsible for this mess may still be here... unless this was your doing?
Volo_Massacre.context: NodeContext: polite advice on first sentence, and then a warning. The final phrase is a mixture of curiosity and awe

Volo_Massacre.speaker: Volo
Volo_Massacre.text: You? Why? And how? But wait, wait - let me get a fresh quill. Now. You were saying?
Volo_Massacre.context: NodeContext: preparing to take notes like an inquisitive journalist at a crime scene

Volo_Massacre.speaker: Player
Volo_Massacre.text: Never mind. What are you doing here anyway - looting corpses?

Volo_Massacre.speaker: Volo
Volo_Massacre.text: Just nosing out the facts. Something happened here, and it's my job - my calling - to discover what.
Volo_Massacre.context: NodeContext: arrogant - his 'calling' (at this moment, asking annoying questions) is the most important thing in the world as far as he sees it

Volo_Massacre.speaker: Volo
Volo_Massacre.text: But if you won't tell me, no matter. A truth is second best to the truth.
Volo_Massacre.context: NodeContext: journalistic type who is more interested in a good story than a true story

Volo_Massacre.speaker: Volo
Volo_Massacre.text: Hmmm... Your story may be relevant, but the stench of this place is hardly suited to civilised conversation.
Volo_Massacre.context: NodeContext: politely trying to tag along with the players

Volo_Massacre.speaker: Volo
Volo_Massacre.text: I wonder if we might continue this elsewhere. You've a brain I'd like to pick.

Volo_Massacre.speaker: Player
Volo_Massacre.text: Pick a different brain. I can't help you.

Volo_Massacre.speaker: Volo
Volo_Massacre.text: I'll be no trouble, my friend. Name a location and I'd be happy to meet you there.

Trespassing.speaker: Narrator
Trespassing.text: *A strange symbol glows, marked on their flesh, and something within you stirs in response.*

Goblin.speaker: Brawler Rancer
Goblin.text: Tha's the that of it. Heh!

Goblin006.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy
Goblin006.text: Awshh... drink's goin' straight through me...
Goblin006.context: NodeContext: drunk, to the point he's slightly unsteady on his feet

Goblin006.speaker: Player
Goblin006.text: The only cure is drinking more - as fast as you can.

Goblin006.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy
Goblin006.text: That's the plan! We looted an entire inn - brought back enough booze to drown a dragon.
Goblin006.context: NodeContext: drunk - explaining the reasons for the party with respect and excitement

Goblin006.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy
Goblin006.text: Here's to them we nicked it off! Down one mug of ale for every throat we cut!
Goblin006.context: NodeContext: as if proposing a toast; he's drinking and celebrating

GoblinKid001.speaker: Five
GoblinKid001.context: NodeContext: "horns" line is a kid impressed by an adult who has ACTUAL HORNS - other line is dismissive and bratty

GoblinSleeper_01.speaker: Tracker Dullwill
GoblinSleeper_01.text: Try to keep it down, boss. My head's killing me.
GoblinSleeper_01.context: NodeContext: holding his head, wincing in pain from a hangover, trying to be respectful

Trader.speaker: Grat the Trader
Trader.text: You look like you got something jingling in your pocket.
Trader.context: CinematicNodeContext: Standing in front of his goods, laid out on a blanket

Trader.speaker: Player
Trader.text: Quite the trove. How'd you get your hands on all this?

Trader.speaker: Grat the Trader
Trader.text: Nicked 'em off the dead, didn't I?

Trader.speaker: Grat the Trader
Trader.text: Erh, I mean - raid spoils, your majesticality.
Trader.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wide-eyed, bowingNodeContext: Regretting his choice of words

GoblinKid000.speaker: Four
GoblinKid000.text: Ugh. You look like you've been kissin' a worg's backside.
GoblinKid000.context: CinematicNodeContext: waving his hand in front of his nose, exaggerating a bad smellNodeContext: disgusted and amused - reacting to player having dung smeared on their face. Worg is a wolf-like animal (

GoblinKid000.speaker: Four
GoblinKid000.text: Piss off, or you'll end up like this bleeder.
GoblinKid000.context: NodeContext: cocky, aggressive - 'this bleeder' is a dead adventurer at his feet

GoblinKid000.speaker: Player
GoblinKid000.text: Keep threatening me. See what happens.

GoblinKid000.speaker: Four
GoblinKid000.text: Oh,  you're real tough. Bullying a kid.
GoblinKid000.context: NodeContext: we fell for his bait and now he's mocking us

GoblinKid000.speaker: Four
GoblinKid000.text: Sod off or I'll fetch my mum. She was tough as worg meat before the Absolute came along.
GoblinKid000.context: NodeContext: mocking- Like a teenager doing a "my dad could beat up your dad" bit. Heavy emphasis on 'before' to set up the follow-up in the following line.

GoblinKid000.speaker: Four
GoblinKid000.text: Now... she could punch out a dragon!
GoblinKid000.context: NodeContext: Exaggerating but kind of believes it. Pause after 'now' as he punches a fist into his other palm

BugbearSleeper_00.speaker: Stimk
BugbearSleeper_00.text: Vaws-hak. My head hurts bad. You crash about like a drunken ogre.
BugbearSleeper_00.context: CinematicNodeContext: perhaps stmik walks into shot if the player is hitting the wall.NodeContext: (Vors-hack) means death - here delievered as an angry curse on waking. Not shouted. Seeting with anger, just woke and has a bad headache from drinking

BugbearSleeper_00.speaker: Stimk
BugbearSleeper_00.text: Didn't think drow were so clumsy. Leave us to rest.
BugbearSleeper_00.context: NodeContext: annoyed, but doesn't want to start a fight with a drow so trying to appease

Goblin007.speaker: Warlock Gurk
Goblin007.text: Hey, can I see yer brand? The priestess gave me one, and I think she did it wrong.
Goblin007.context: NodeContext: He has been branded (by choice) and his arm is badly burned. He's too drunk to care too much though

Goblin007.speaker: Player
Goblin007.text: Priestess? Is she a healer, too?

Goblin007.speaker: Warlock Gurk
Goblin007.text: Heh. Seen 'er carve more folk than she's cured. Still, she's a Chosen o' the Absolute now.

Goblin007.speaker: Warlock Gurk
Goblin007.text: Hold on. I was askin' you sumfin', wasn't I?
Goblin007.context: NodeContext: Drunk, trying to remember what they were talking about.

Goblin000.speaker: Devout Mezzka
Goblin000.text: Wanna play, yer honour? Krolla will get you started.

DwarfOperator000.speaker: Tracker Klagga
DwarfOperator000.text: Greetings, your most excellent drow-ness. What do you think of these breeches? Could be a new uniform.
DwarfOperator000.context: CinematicNodeContext: adjusting his new breeches, swaggeringNodeContext: He's adjusting his new breeches, impressed with his own fashion-sense

DwarfOperator000.speaker: Player
DwarfOperator000.text: They look quite fetching on you.

DwarfOperator000.speaker: Tracker Klagga
DwarfOperator000.text: Proper stylish, ain't they? Nicked 'em off this dwarf we're cookin'.
DwarfOperator000.context: NodeContext: pleased with himself, talking about his new breeches

GoblinKid002_LootingCrime.speaker: Eight
GoblinKid002_LootingCrime.text: Oi, get off! I killed him - he's mine!
GoblinKid002_LootingCrime.context: CinematicNodeContext: planer knelt looting bodyNodeContext: wave hands to shoo looting player.

GoblinKid002_LootingCrime.speaker: Narrator
GoblinKid002_LootingCrime.text: *A strange symbol glows, marked on their flesh, and something within you stirs in response.*

ThreeWayDialog.speaker: Sazza
ThreeWayDialog.text: Mistress! It's me, yer loyal servant, Sazza. I'm back - an' I brought a friend.

ThreeWayDialog.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog.text: How thoughtful. And where did you find this friend?

AlarmUsedReaction.speaker: Sentinel Olak
AlarmUsedReaction.text: That's lovely stuff, True Soul. Only... we smack that drum so the lads know there's killin' on.
AlarmUsedReaction.context: NodeContext: Goblin repsects player and is impressed by the song they played.

AlarmUsedReaction.speaker: Sentinel Olak
AlarmUsedReaction.text: Not to worry! I'll set 'em straight. Bit of music never hurt anyone, eh?

Guard005.speaker: Sharp-Eye Snurd
Guard005.text: I can see the Absolute from here. I can!

Guard004.speaker: Tracker Rindle
Guard004.context: InternalNodeContext: fallback for alt entry pathsNodeContext: Player is allowed inside; 'leave me alone' intention here.

Worg_001.speaker: Klaw
Worg_001.text: Wearin' me muck. Muck on ya. Good muck.
Worg_001.context: NodeContext: Sniffing and snuffling at the shit on your face. Spoken quickly, primal.

CliffWarning.speaker: Sharp-Eye Snurd
CliffWarning.text: Oi, thicko! This here's off-limits. Get to the main gate, or I'll plug you full o' arrows.
CliffWarning.context: NodeContext: Warning an intruder to leave  - shouting last line

ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.speaker: Sentinel Olak
ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.text: Well! Look who's gettin' dragged back. And by such high company! How badly did you mess up?
ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.context: NodeContext: Olak to Sazza, a fellow goblin he doesn't have respect for.

ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.speaker: Sazza
ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.text: Can it! I know something Ragzlin will want to hear.
ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.context: NodeContext: Sazza is ragging on Olak. They don't like each other.

ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.speaker: Sazza
ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.text: I been in some druids' grove. This one sprang me. Now move over, so I can tell Ragzlin myself!
ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.context: NodeContext: Sazza is arguing on the player's behalf to the hostile Olak.

ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.speaker: Sentinel Olak
ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.text: Hold on. Where are the raiders?
ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.context: NodeContext: Olak is full of gleeful malice.

ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.speaker: Sentinel Olak
ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.text: Ragzlin's drow friend won't be happy to hear that.

ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.speaker: Sazza
ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.text: She'll be happy enough when I tell her where them looters is holin' up. Let me through.
ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.context: NodeContext: Hard 'g' on ranga. Sazza's pride is wounded but she hates Olak, so doesn't want to show it.

ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.speaker: Sentinel Olak
ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.context: CinematicNodeContext: Olak turns to the playerNodeContext: To player. Cool and malicious.

ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.speaker: Sentinel Olak
ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.text: Is it true, what Saz says? You helped her escape that grove?
ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.context: NodeContext: To player. Genuine inquiry, but he's disinclined to believe you.

ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.speaker: Sentinel Olak
ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.text: Quiet type, eh? Good. Keep outta trouble, or you and Saz'll get it.
ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.context: NodeContext: e's not exactly friendly here, but he will let you into camp.

ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.speaker: Sazza
ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.context: NodeContext: Sazza to Olak. 'Shut up and let us in.'

ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.speaker: Sazza
ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.text: C'mon! Gotta let the drow know where them looters is. We'll be heroes!
ThreeWayDialogWithCapturedGoblin.context: NodeContext: To player. More bright and friendly.

Guard002.speaker: Warrior Puce
Guard002.context: InternalNodeContext: fallback for alt entry pathsNodeContext: Neutral, not particularly friendly but not hostile

Worg_002.speaker: Small Klaw
Worg_002.text: Good smell. Pack smell. Smell like papa. Papa?
Worg_002.context: NodeContext: Sniffing at the shit on your face. Quick, primal - as if looking for comfort.

Friend2.speaker: Brawler Tiny
Friend2.text: So yer followin' me? Think yer intimidatin' now?

Friend2.speaker: Brawler Tiny
Friend2.text: I ain't scared. I'll claw yer eyes out if you come any closer.

LocalRat_001.speaker: Narrator
LocalRat_001.text: *The foul stench of slaughter turns suddenly sweet through the rat's nose.*

LocalRat_001.speaker: Narrator
LocalRat_001.text: *Blood-smell. Life-smell. Not like the great hollow below, which smells only of death.*

LocalRat_002.speaker: Narrator
LocalRat_002.text: *A longing for small spaces, stone walls hugging close. Confining. Comforting.*

LocalRat_002.speaker: Narrator
LocalRat_002.text: *There is a light here, in the tight space beneath the floor. Secret things that shine.*

Guard.speaker: Warrior Plig
Guard.text: Steal somethin' or act the bollocks, will ya? I'm itching to throw someone in the brig. It'll be fun. I promise.
Guard.context: NodeContext: plig wants the player to act out so she can throw them in jail

Goblin_003.speaker: Tracker Nik-Nuk
Goblin_003.text: Heh. Boss Ragzlin weren't lying when he said anyone could join the Absolute's ranks.

Dead.speaker: Player
Dead.text: What did you want with that mind flayer?

EyeMurder_AD.speaker: Dror Ragzlin, Erna, GROUP_Goblins, Nightwarden Minthara, Yerle
EyeMurder_AD.text: 'S dead. Spied one too many bowels movin', I expect.
EyeMurder_AD.context: NodeContext: Satisfied contempt - the goblins hated this creepy thing and are glad it's dead

DrunkGoblin.speaker: Crusher
DrunkGoblin.text: VO_SFX : The goblin bends over and kisses the player's foot
DrunkGoblin.context: CinematicNodeContext: Needs to be mocaped InternalNodeContext: Needs to be mocaped

DrunkGoblin.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
DrunkGoblin.text: VO_SFX: All surrounding Goblins cackle as the drunk goblin point out the player kissed his feet

DrunkGoblin.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
DrunkGoblin.text: VO_SFX: All surrounding Goblins menacingly cackle as the drunk goblin threatens the player

Spiders_CantSpeak.speaker: Narrator
Spiders_CantSpeak.text: *The spider seems poised to attack, but she hesitates, tapping her claws as if trying to communicate.*

Spiders_CantSpeak.speaker: Narrator
Spiders_CantSpeak.text: *You, however, are unable to speak. Her hesitation turns to impatience.*
Spiders_CantSpeak.context: NodeContext: Starts combat, the spider lunges.

Adventurer.speaker: Smythin
Adventurer.text: Thanks. I thought I was done for.

CapturedGoblin.speaker: Sazza
CapturedGoblin.text: Let me go. I'll sneak off and become a hermit - won't cause trouble for nobody.
CapturedGoblin.context: NodeContext: pleading; just survived an attempted execution

Torturers_Goblet_AssaultCustom.speaker: Lookout Grush
Torturers_Goblet_AssaultCustom.text: NO! He was MINE! Mine to kill!

Torturers_Goblet_AssaultCustom.speaker: Lookout Grush
Torturers_Goblet_AssaultCustom.text: I'll cut you for this. Cut you to pieces and mix all your meat. And then I will FEAST.

Torturers_Spike_MurderCustom.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torturers_Spike_MurderCustom.text: He can't be dead! I never got any answers out of him!
Torturers_Spike_MurderCustom.context: InternalNodeContext: Goblins don't know where the den is.NodeContext: Spike is extremely worried. The palyer killed the prisoner he had to extract information from, and he's certain his commander will kill him for his failure.

Torturers_Spike_MurderCustom.speaker: Torturer Spike
Torturers_Spike_MurderCustom.text: She'll kill me. This is it. This is the end... but oh, I'll make you pay before I die.
Torturers_Spike_MurderCustom.context: NodeContext: Fiercely angry - about to attack the player.

PostPenance.speaker: Abdirak
PostPenance.context: NodeContext: Player has finished penance. Speaking to player as if speaking to a loved one.

PostPenance.speaker: Abdirak
PostPenance.text: Loviatar herself found your performance inspiring and wishes to bless you.
PostPenance.context: NodeContext: Voice intimate and filled with admiration. His goddess has chosen to bless the player - a sacred gift.

PostPenance.speaker: Player
PostPenance.text: What would such a blessing entail?

PostPenance.speaker: Abdirak
PostPenance.context: NodeContext: As if speaking to a lover.

CinematicNodeContext: This can be anything - for reaching a hand out and gently passing it over the player to holding both hands out and closing his eyes in concentration as he passes on the blessing. As long as it is something that indicates that a spell/blessing is happening, it can be anything. NodeContext: Not voiced

PostPenance.speaker: Abdirak
PostPenance.text: And on a personal note, thank you. That was positively divine.
PostPenance.context: NodeContext: This is a low, sultry. Almost whispered in the player's ear. Sexy and intimate. But also creepy as all hell.

Battlestation.speaker: Abdirak
Battlestation.text: My penitent child, the goblins have blood on their minds. I am leaving - I suggest you do the same.
Battlestation.context: NodeContext: The goblins are fighting, he's calm and measured but about to flee. He wants no part in it.

TortureredAdventurer_AssaultCustom.speaker: Narrator
TortureredAdventurer_AssaultCustom.text: *The goblin appears annoyed. It might be best to leave the prisoner alone.*
TortureredAdventurer_AssaultCustom.context: InternalNodeContext: Assault - gobs don't know about Den

Backup_02.speaker: Tracker Tizg
Backup_02.text: Go on. If you've business in 'ere, best not to keep a True Soul waitin'.
Backup_02.context: NodeContext: Bored, done talking to you, ushering you inside

Branding.speaker: True Soul Gut
Branding.text: Ready to figure out what's goin' on with those shadows in your head?

SpottedHostilePlayer.text: You! I remember you from the forest. You should never have come here.
SpottedHostilePlayer.context: NodeContext: They are hostile toward you and will fight you after htis line.

Parent.speaker: Brawler Birka
Parent.context: NodeContext: Proud that the bear died

HalsinsBear_AfterCombat.speaker: Halsin
HalsinsBear_AfterCombat.text: You did it. You actually did it! The leaders dead - praise Silvanus.
HalsinsBear_AfterCombat.context: InternalNodeContext: Disable his dialogue, he then disappears, appears in the Grove and gets a new dialogueNodeContext: Jubilant. The leaders of the horde threatening his home have been eliminated.

HalsinsBear_AfterCombat.speaker: Halsin
HalsinsBear_AfterCombat.text: No, that's not right - praise you, my friend. The grove owes you a debt beyond measure.

HalsinsBear_AfterCombat.speaker: Halsin
HalsinsBear_AfterCombat.text: Killing's never my first choice, but those three were too dangerous to leave alive.

HalsinsBear_AfterCombat.speaker: Halsin
HalsinsBear_AfterCombat.text: And you'll receive it soon enough. Return to the grove; I'll make my own way there.

Beastmaster002.speaker: Beastmaster Zurk
Beastmaster002.text: Ever tried cuttin' up an elf? All skin an' bones, the rangy gits. My arm's gonna be sore tomorrow.

Worg_001.speaker: Ferr
Worg_001.text: Smells big. Big belly. Big GUTS.

Halsin_Following_Elf.speaker: Halsin
Halsin_Following_Elf.text: The ringleaders of these butchers still draw breath. Nobody is safe until we stop them.

Halsin_Following_Elf.speaker: Halsin
Halsin_Following_Elf.text: Hurry, please. Any delay could cost innocents' lives.

HalsinsBear_AfterCombat_InCage.speaker: Halsin
HalsinsBear_AfterCombat_InCage.text: Get rid of them. Release me.
HalsinsBear_AfterCombat_InCage.context: CinematicNodeContext: Speak with animals lineInternalNodeContext: Speak with animals lineNodeContext: Speak with animals line

Kid_001.speaker: One
Kid_001.text: D'you think it's bad to keep throwing stones at a dead lump?
Kid_001.context: NodeContext: curious, a bit naughty. She doesn't think it's bad at all.
